summary: November 2008. When her parents go out for diner, Louise, 18-years old, finds herself trapped in a room of the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel in Mumbai during a terrorist attack.
cast: Stacy Martin|Louis-Do de Lencquesaing|Gina McKee|Alba Rohrwacher|Fred Epaud|Praveena Vivekananthan|Mark Simpson
title: Taj Mahal
